title: The Animal Communicator - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/25/19
itunes:title: The Animal Communicator - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/25/19
description:
George Noory and animal psychic Amelia Kinkade explore her work communicating with animals on safaris as well as household pets, and gives tips on ways pet owners can learn to better communicate with their own animals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
